posts.post_content: With [Riku of Two Reflections](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Riku of Two Reflections) copying it, you have a 75% chance of at least one extra turn and a 25% chance of two extra turns.
posts.html:

Posted By: Inanimate- (1/15/2012 6:31:28 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
"I say it's a pretty good card for getting an extra turn. Only three mana and not much of a downside."  
  
The downside is that if this doesn't work, you just burned three mana and a card for absolutely nothing.  
  
You need krark's thumb for this, and even then it's only a 75% chance of success.  
  
It's undoubtedly a fun card, but not tournament worthy.
posts.html:

posts.post_content: Nobody has said [Panoptic Mirror](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Panoptic Mirror)? it's so awesome with this card. Just every upkeep, flip a coin get a turn and keep going till you stop. [Paradox haze](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Paradox haze) can give you more chances, or cast another imprinted spell if you already got the other turn. I'm not gonna even mention [krark's thumb](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=krark's thumb) because it's too obvious. Except i did so whatever.
